Catalog.NodeList:
SELECT * FROM COM_CTL_NAV_NODE WHERE PARENT_ID={parent_id} ORDER BY DISP_ORDER
SELECT * FROM COM_CTL_NAV_NODE WHERE PARENT_ID={parent_id} AND IS_VALID = 'Y' AND COM_CTL_NAV_ROLE_DI.Has_Permission(NODE_ID) = 'Y' ORDER BY DISP_ORDER
Catalog.NodeRole: SELECT {node_id} NODE_ID, r.ROLE_NAME, r.DESCRIPTION ROLE_DESC, n.IS_VALID, n.BEGIN_DATE, n.END_DATE FROM COM_PMS_ROLE r, (SELECT * FROM COM_CTL_NAV_ROLE WHERE NODE_ID = {node_id}) n WHERE r.ROLE_NAME = n.ROLE_NAME(+)

Permission.Control: SELECT r.ROLE_NAME, r.DESCRIPTION ROLE_DESC, cr.GROUP_ID, cr.WINDOW_ID, cr.CONTROL_ID, cr.IS_VALID, cr.DISPLAY_ABLE, cr.EDIT_ABLE, cr.INSERT_ABLE, cr.UPDATE_ABLE, cr.DELETE_ABLE, cr.EXECUTE_ABLE FROM COM_PMS_ROLE r, ( SELECT * FROM MSC_CTL_ROLE_DS WHERE GROUP_ID = {group_id} AND WINDOW_ID = (SELECT WINDOW_ID FROM MSC_CTL_WINDOW WHERE WINDOW_NAME={window_name}) AND CONTROL_ID = (SELECT CONTROL_ID FROM MSC_CTL_CONTROL WHERE CONTROL_NAME={control_name})) cr WHERE r.ROLE_NAME = cr.ROLE_NAME(+)
Permission.UserContros: SELECT c.CONTROL_NAME, r.DISPLAY_ABLE, r.EDIT_ABLE, r.INSERT_ABLE, r.UPDATE_ABLE, r.DELETE_ABLE, r.EXECUTE_ABLE FROM MSC_CTL_WINDOW w, MSC_CTL_CONTROL c, ( SELECT CONTROL_ID, MAX(DISPLAY_ABLE) DISPLAY_ABLE, MAX(EDIT_ABLE) EDIT_ABLE, MAX(INSERT_ABLE) INSERT_ABLE, MAX(UPDATE_ABLE) UPDATE_ABLE, MAX(DELETE_ABLE) DELETE_ABLE, MAX(EXECUTE_ABLE) EXECUTE_ABLE FROM MSC_CTL_ROLE WHERE GROUP_ID={group_id} AND WINDOW_ID={window_id} AND IS_VALID='Y' AND SYS_APP_SECURITY.Has_Role(ROLE_NAME) = 'Y' GROUP BY CONTROL_ID ) r WHERE w.WINDOW_ID = {window_id} AND w.WINDOW_ID = c.WINDOW_ID
